full_summary:
**Title**
Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

## Call for Tender Information

**IDIQ Contract Number**: 5000079430

**Project Title**: Indigenous Knowledge and Geo-Observations Platform Development

**Publication Date**: January 31, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**: February 15, 2024 2:00 PM

**Summary of Requirement**

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires a contractor to build geo-functions into a free, existing mobile app that has gained popularity among Indigenous northerners. The app is used for documenting, posting, and sharing knowledge of the land. The contractor will leverage and build on the existing SIKU frameworks and technological advancements developed by the Arctic Eider Society to incorporate geoscience profiles and a geo observation "Post" tool. This development aims to expand the user-friendly web and mobile platform to allow non-specialists to recognize, document, and share observations of geoscience elements.

**Notice Details**

* **Contracting Authority**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCAN)
* **Location**: Sanikiluaq, Canada (Indigenous Lands)
* **Contract Period**: February 16, 2024 - March 31, 2025

**Procurement Details**

* **UNSPSC Codes**: Web platform development software (43232408), Industry-specific software (43232600)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Method of Procurement**: Advance Contract Award Notice

**Contact Information**

Please contact Nadine Gudbranson, Contract Manager at:

* Email: [nadine.gudbranson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:nadine.gudbranson@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 543-7068

**Tender Documents**
To access the tender documents, please visit:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30930/acan-5000079430-%28eng_1.pdf

French Version:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30930/pac-5000079430-%28fr.pdf
